jobActions.name: Riposte
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 130.
Action upgraded to Enchanted Riposte if both Black Mana and White Mana are at 20 or more.

jobActions.name: Jolt
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 170.
Additional Effect: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 2

jobActions.name: Verthunder
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 360.
Additional Effect: Increases Black Mana by 6
Additional Effect: 50% chance of becoming Verfire Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Corps-a-corps
jobActions.description:
Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 130.
Maximum Charges: 2
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Veraero
jobActions.description:
Deals wind damage with a potency of 360.
Additional Effect: Increases White Mana by 6
Additional Effect: 50% chance of becoming Verstone Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Scatter
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 120 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Acceleration Potency: 170
Additional Effect: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 3

jobActions.name: Verthunder II
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 140 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Increases Black Mana by 7

jobActions.name: Veraero II
jobActions.description:
Deals wind damage with a potency of 140 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Increases White Mana by 7

jobActions.name: Verfire
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 330.
Additional Effect: Increases Black Mana by 5
Can only be executed while Verfire Ready is active.

jobActions.name: Verstone
jobActions.description:
Deals earth damage with a potency of 330.
Additional Effect: Increases White Mana by 5
Can only be executed while Verstone Ready is active.

jobActions.name: Zwerchhau
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Combo Action: Riposte or Enchanted Riposte
Combo Potency: 150
Action upgraded to Enchanted Zwerchhau if both Black Mana and White Mana are at 15 or more.

jobActions.name: Displacement
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.
Additional Effect: 15-yalm backstep
Maximum Charges: 2
Cannot be executed while bound.
Shares a recast timer with Engagement.

jobActions.name: Engagement
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.
Maximum Charges: 2
Shares a recast timer with Displacement.

jobActions.name: Fleche
jobActions.description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 460.

jobActions.name: Redoublement
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Combo Action: Zwerchhau or Enchanted Zwerchhau
Combo Potency: 230
Action upgraded to Enchanted Redoublement if both Black Mana and White Mana are at 15 or more.

jobActions.name: Acceleration
jobActions.description:
Ensures the next Verthunder III, Veraero III, or Impact can be cast immediately.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Increases the potency of Impact by 50
Additional Effect: Ensures Verthunder III and Veraero III trigger Verfire Ready or Verstone Ready respectively
Maximum Charges: 2

jobActions.name: Moulinet
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 60 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Action upgraded to Enchanted Moulinet if both Black Mana and White Mana are at 20 or more.

jobActions.name: Vercure
jobActions.description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 350

jobActions.name: Contre Sixte
jobActions.description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 360 to target and all enemies nearby it.

jobActions.name: Embolden
jobActions.description:
Increases own magic damage dealt by 5% and damage dealt by nearby party members by 5%.
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Manafication
jobActions.description:
Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 50.
Additional Effect: Grants 6 stacks of Manafication
Manafication Effect: Increases magic damage dealt by 5%
Duration: 15s
All combos are canceled upon execution of Manafication.
Can only be executed while in combat.

jobActions.name: Jolt II
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 310.
Additional Effect: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 2

jobActions.name: Verraise
jobActions.description: Resurrects target to a weakened state.

jobActions.name: Impact
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 210 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Acceleration Potency: 260
Additional Effect: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 3

jobActions.name: Verflare
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 580 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Increases Black Mana by 11
Additional Effect: 20% chance of becoming Verfire Ready
Duration: 30s
Chance to become Verfire Ready increases to 100% if White Mana is higher than Black Mana at time of execution.
Mana Stack Cost: 3

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Verholy
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 580 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Increases White Mana by 11
Additional Effect: 20% chance of becoming Verstone Ready
Duration: 30s
Chance to become Verstone Ready increases to 100% if Black Mana is higher than White Mana at time of execution.
Mana Stack Cost: 3

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Reprise
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Action upgraded to Enchanted Reprise if both Black Mana and White Mana are at 5 or more.

jobActions.name: Scorch
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 680 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Combo Action: Verflare or Verholy
Additional Effect: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 4
Jolt II and Impact are changed to Scorch upon landing Verflare or Verholy as a combo action.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Verthunder III
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 380.
Additional Effect: Increases Black Mana by 6
Additional Effect: 50% chance of becoming Verfire Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Veraero III
jobActions.description:
Deals wind damage with a potency of 380.
Additional Effect: Increases White Mana by 6
Additional Effect: 50% chance of becoming Verstone Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Magick Barrier
jobActions.description:
Reduces magic damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%, while increasing HP recovered by healing actions by 5%.
Duration: 10s

jobActions.name: Resolution
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 750 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Combo Action: Scorch
Additional Effect: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 4
Scorch is changed to Resolution upon landing Scorch as a combo action.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Enchanted Riposte
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 280.
Additional Effect: Grants a Mana Stack
Balance Gauge Cost: 20 Black Mana
Balance Gauge Cost: 20 White Mana

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Enchanted Zwerchhau
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150.
Combo Action: Riposte or Enchanted Riposte
Combo Potency: 340
Additional Effect: Grants a Mana Stack
Balance Gauge Cost: 15 Black Mana
Balance Gauge Cost: 15 White Mana

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Enchanted Redoublement
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 130.
Combo Action: Enchanted Zwerchhau
Combo Potency: 500
Additional Effect: Grants a Mana Stack
Balance Gauge Cost: 15 Black Mana
Balance Gauge Cost: 15 White Mana

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Enchanted Moulinet
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 130 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: Grants a Mana Stack
Balance Gauge Cost: 20 Black Mana
Balance Gauge Cost: 20 White Mana

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Enchanted Reprise
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 330.
Balance Gauge Cost: 5 Black Mana
Balance Gauge Cost: 5 White Mana

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

roleActions.name: Addle
roleActions.description:
Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 5% and magic damage dealt by 10%.
Duration: 10s

roleActions.name: Sleep
roleActions.description:
Puts target and all nearby enemies to sleep.
Duration: 30s
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.

roleActions.name: Swiftcast
roleActions.description:
Next spell is cast immediately.
Duration: 10s

roleActions.name: Lucid Dreaming
roleActions.description:
Gradually restores own MP.
Potency: 55
Duration: 21s

roleActions.name: Surecast
roleActions.description:
Spells can be cast without interruption.
Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 6s

traits.name: Dualcast
traits.description:
Grants the effect of Dualcast upon casting any spell with a cast time. While under the effect of Dualcast, your next spell will require no time to cast. Effect is canceled upon execution of any action other than an ability. Auto-attacks do not cancel effect.
Duration: 15s

traits.name: Maim and Mend
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.

traits.name: Maim and Mend II
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.

traits.name: Enhanced Jolt
traits.description: Upgrades Jolt to Jolt II. Also increases the potency of Verthunder and Veraero to 360, and the potency of Verfire and Verstone to 300.

traits.name: Mana Stack
traits.description:
Adds a Mana Stack to your Balance Gauge upon landing Enchanted Riposte, Enchanted Zwerchhau, Enchanted Redoublement, or Enchanted Moulinet, up to a maximum of 3.
Upon gaining 3 Mana Stacks, Verthunder and Verthunder II are upgraded to Verflare.
Upon learning Verholy, gaining 3 Mana Stacks also upgrades Veraero and Veraero II to Verholy.

traits.name: Enhanced Displacement
traits.description: Increases Displacement and Engagement potency to 180.

traits.name: Red Magic Mastery
traits.description: Reduces Contre Sixte recast timer to 35 seconds and increases the potency of both Verthunder II and Veraero II to 120.

traits.name: Enhanced Manafication
traits.description: Reduces Manafication recast timer to 110 seconds and adds an additional effect that increases magic damage dealt by 5%.

traits.name: Red Magic Mastery II
traits.description:
Upgrades Verthunder to Verthunder III and Veraero to Veraero III.
Upon gaining 3 Mana Stacks, Verthunder III is upgraded to Verflare and Veraero III is upgraded to Verholy.

traits.name: Red Magic Mastery III
traits.description: Increases the potency of Enchanted Riposte to 280, Verthunder II to 140, Veraero II to 140, Verfire to 330, Verstone to 330, Enchanted Zwerchhau to 150, Enchanted Redoublement to 130, Jolt II to 310, Impact to 210, and Enchanted Reprise to 330.

traits.name: Enhanced Acceleration
traits.description:
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Acceleration.
Maximum Charges: 2

traits.name: Enhanced Manafication II
traits.description: Increases maximum stacks of Manafication to 6.
